sentences.sContent: Look at their hypocrisy, they have defence deal with both India and Pakistan.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look at their hypocrisy, they have defence deal with both India and Pakistan.
sentences.sCn: 看看他们的伪善，他们同印度和巴基斯坦都有防卫协议。

sentences.sContent: Yes we have to build good quality infrastructure, so any good investment is welcome if its not against interests of India.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes we have to build good quality infrastructure, so any good investment is welcome if its not against interests of India.
sentences.sCn: 是的，我们必须修建发达的基础设施，只要不违背印度的国家利益，任何投资都是受欢迎的。

sentences.sContent: Why no survey about that in India ?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why no survey about that in India ?
sentences.sCn: 为什么不在印度搞调查？

phrases.pCn: 东印度（指印度，印度支那半岛，马来半岛和马来群岛等）
小印度（新加坡印度族群的聚集地）
英属印度（原为印度的一部分，后分属印度和巴基斯坦）
